channel.description: Recent content in devops on Cattleguard Blog

item.title: Jenkins, My First Pipeline
item.description: Maybe it’s more of a crazy straw than a pipeline. It’s certainly more fun than useful at the moment. I know, it’s 2020 and there are other CI/CD tools out there. Slicker tools. I don’t really know any of them. So, why Jenkins? Jenkins has been around, it supports a lot of build types and stages, and my unscientific research of querying the job listings on Indeed.com and LinkedIn.com show it to still be pretty well owning the market.
